# Data Buddies Solutions - AI Agent Automation for Small Businesses

## About
Data Buddies Solutions provides AI automation services for small businesses. We specialize in building custom AI agents that handle workflows, provide data insights, and automate repetitive tasks.

## Services
- AI Agent Development
- Business Process Automation
- Data Analysis and Insights
- Appointment Scheduling Automation
- Administrative Task Automation
- Inventory Management

## Target Audience
Small to medium-sized businesses looking to leverage AI automation without enterprise-level complexity or cost.

## Contact
Email: databuddiessolutions@gmail.com
Booking: https://cal.com/data-buddies-solutions/30min

## Company Background
Founded by AI automation specialists from corporate tech who focus on making cutting-edge automation accessible to small businesses.

## Key Value Propositions
1. AI agents that work 24/7
2. Focus on practical business workflows
3. Accessible technology for small businesses
4. Data-driven insights to boost revenue
5. Reduce time spent on repetitive tasks
